name: End of My Grapple
description:
My entry for 'The Dream Arcade Archive', Game jam. 

End of My Grapple Is a procedurally generated dungeon game crawler, about using a your grappling hooks to destroy enemies and collect coins, in an effort to get the best possible score. 

ps. use the escape key to pause the game ingame at any time.

Note* is a Jam Game so do expect some glitches here and there.

Made By Esewi Egheosa
